p:
On January 24, The Lancet reported a familial cluster of SARS‐CoV‐2 infection. Five family members with a travel history to Wuhan were confirmed to have COVID‐19 after returning to Shenzhen, with their asymptomatic child presenting with no fever, respiratory tract symptoms or diarrhoea but had ground‐glass lung opacities seen on radiography.
26 Subsequently, asymptomatic patients were discovered in many Chinese cities with most of them having an epidemiological history.
